ssot__Device__dlm.name: Device
ssot__Device__dlm.description: The Device DMO represents a specific electronic unit you want to track signals from, such as a refrigerator, watch, or car.

ssot__AdvertiserId__c.description: A reference ID for the advertiser that owns the device or that is the source of the device record.

ssot__DataSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system’s logical name that is the source of records identified by an external record ID.

ssot__DataSourceObjectId__c.description: A reference ID for an object’s logical name where this record originated, whether that is a name of a cloud storage file or another connector’s external object.

ssot__Id__c.description: A unique ID used as the primary key for the device DMO.

ssot__DeviceNumber__c.description: A number assigned to the device.

ssot__DeviceSystemTokentext__c.description: A token assigned to the device that uniquely identifies the device from the perspective of the operating system.

ssot__DeviceTypeId__c.description: The reference ID for the type of device.

ssot__ExternalRecordId__c.description: A reference ID for an external data source system.

ssot__ExternalSourceId__c.description: A reference ID for the system in which the external record ID was assigned.

ssot__GCMSenderId__c.description: A reference ID assigned to the device in Google Cloud Messaging (GCM).

ssot__InternalOrganizationId__c.description: A reference ID to the business unit or other internal organization that owns the data record.

ssot__LastModifiedDate__c.description: The date when a user last modified the record.

ssot__OSVersionNumber__c.description: The operating system version number for the device’s OS.
